topic.title: PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING)
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Episodic and Daily Care, PROCEDURE YEAR AND MONTH (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING) is submitted instead of PROCEDURE DATE AND TIME (RETINOPATHY OF PREMATURITY SCREENING), where the data set record is anonymised.
